name: Rocket Powered Tin Cans
description:
Your mission is to reach the warp gate while staying away from the disintegration field.
To speed up, add a rocket with spacebar. To slow down... -checks notes- add a rocket with spacebar. Uh... did I mention there's asteroids? Oh boy.

Made by Ben Luker and Zane Zukovsky. Motion graphics courtesy of Nicholas Woodworth. (Thanks Nic!)

GMTK submission clarification: We made all of the art ourselves except for the skybox. But we can't in good conscience say "we made all of the art ourselves" considering how important that art asset is to our game. If only there was an option in between. Oh well!
